Doctors
# Name Email Phone
{{doctor?.firstName}} {{doctor?.lastName}} {{doctor?.email}} {{doctor?.phone}}
Specialist
Name {{currentDoctor.firstName}} {{currentDoctor.lastName}}
Speciality
{{profession.name}}
Email {{currentDoctor.email}}

import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {Doctor} from "../services/doctor"; import {DoctorService} from "../services/doctor.service"; import {HttpErrorResponse} from "@angular/common/http"; @Component({ selector: 'app-doctors', templateUrl: './doctors.component.html', styleUrls: ['./doctors.component.css'] }) export class DoctorsComponent implements OnInit{ public doctors: Doctor[] | undefined; public currentDoctor: Doctor = { id: 0, firstName: "", lastName: "", email: "", phone: "", password: "", imageUrl: "", doctorCode: "", professions: [], }; public doctorId: number | undefined = 1; public doctorFirstName: string | undefined = ""; public doctorLastName: string | undefined = ""; public doctorEmail: string | undefined = ""; public doctorPhone: string | undefined = ""; constructor(private doctorService: DoctorService){ this.doctorService = doctorService; } ngOnInit(){ this.getDoctors(); /* this.doctorId = this.currentDoctor?.id; this.doctorFirstName = this.currentDoctor?.firstName; this.doctorLastName = this.currentDoctor?.lastName; this.doctorEmail = this.currentDoctor?.email this.doctorPhone = this.currentDoctor?.phone; */ } public clickOnSeeMoreButton(doctor: Doctor): void{ const element = document.getElementById(`card-right`); if(element != null) element.style.visibility = 'visible'; else console.log("NULl"); this.currentDoctor = doctor; } public getDoctors(): void { this.doctorService.getDoctors().subscribe( (response: Doctor[]) => { this.doctors = response; }, (error: HttpErrorResponse) => { alert(error.message); } ) } private getCurrentDoctor() { this.doctorService.getDoctorById(1).subscribe( (response: Doctor) => { this.currentDoctor = response; }, (error: HttpErrorResponse) => { alert(error.message); } ) } }
